sentences.en: A blush mantled over the bronzed cheek of the gladiator.
sentences.cn: 斗士古铜色的脸膛顿时涨得通红.

sentences.en: A defeated gladiator would lower his arms a sign of surrender.
sentences.cn: 观众决定斗士的生死.败阵斗士垂下双臂表示投降.

sentences.en: Ankle - high gladiator shoes with a - length dress is definitely a no - no.
sentences.cn: 过膝长裙加及踝罗马鞋绝对是时尚禁忌.

sentences.en: As I held Gladiator, my heart started beating heavily.
sentences.cn: 我搂着“斗士”, 心咚咚地跳着.

sentences.en: Beno : Are you try being a gladiator?
sentences.cn: Beno: 你会争取拿到角斗士头衔 吗 ?

sentences.en: But it was a rare gladiator indeed who could survive multiple fights.
sentences.cn: 军阀和将军会在这里寻找能为他们赢得战争的士兵.

sentences.en: Clerk: Sure. Gladiator and Shark Tale were both four days late.
sentences.cn: 店员: 当然. 《神鬼战士》和《鲨鱼黑帮》这两部片都晚了四天.

sentences.en: Gladiator, my cat, frightened me as he meowed his sad song.
sentences.cn: “喵喵”, 是我的那只猫“斗士”, 他凄惨的叫声着实吓了我一跳.

sentences.en: Isabel looked a moment at the vanquished gladiator.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔望了一眼那个打败的角斗士.

sentences.en: New Hunk boyfriend: Russell Crowe - star of Gladiator.
sentences.cn: 新男友: 拉塞尔·罗,《角斗士》中的明星.

sentences.en: That is the true gladiator feeling.
sentences.cn: 这是真正的斗士的气魄.

sentences.en: The gladiator who defied an emperor.
The Romans followed with a gladiator dimension.
sentences.cn: 罗马人把拳击当格斗比赛.

sentences.en: There is an old painting I did of a gladiator crouching.
sentences.cn: 如果对你来说,它看起来错误,它就是错了,我曾经画过一幅格斗者俯行的画.

sentences.en: This is an arena for gladiators only, for the Titans of the track.
sentences.cn: 这是个仅为勇士而且是仅为此行里的大力士勇士所设的竞技场。

sentences.en: Undoubtedly, Gladiator is the most successful film of the year.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 《角斗士》是本年度最成功的影片.

trans.tran_en: a soldier who fought against other men or wild animals as an entertainment in ancient Rome
